text: Causes of stridor Acute Chronic Infection Malignancy Epiglottitis, retropharyngeal Supraglottic tumours, base abscess, croup of tongue tumours, laryngeal papillomatosis Foreign bodies Subglottic stenosis Aspiration of coin, peanut, etc Following prolonged intubation Airway oedema Laryngomalacia Anaphylaxis, following instrumentation of the airway, drug reaction (e.g. angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors) Acute exacerbation of chronic condition Table 1
